entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Uh Sir?  Many people are saying the oil prices moving up means they will have to pay more at the pump at a time when they can least afford it. One smart ass thinks we should be more concerned with the rising #COVID19 death totals. Those Dems know nothing about sacrificing, Sir.
